version_description:
1. A new filter (SCENE #15)
"- Take off for summer vacation with PICA! Your vacation photos are now more
colorful and jazzy than ever!"

2. the volume button or bluetooth can now be used to take photos
- You can benefit a lot from a selfie stick on your vacation

3. Now we added a brightness setting
- Here comes more detailed and specific photo editing

4. Editing performance improved
- You can enter the editing a lot quicker
- Better performance of applying adjustments on preview.

5. iCloud loading progress is seen
- Apple's server status affects the loading speed
- added a loading progress bar

6. Bug with timer fixed
- Bug fixed where the timer didn’t work properly even after it was set

There are more Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
"If you run into any issues or have a suggestion for a new feature on our app, DM us at @pica.app."

1. A new filter (SCENE #15)
- Take off for summer vacation with PICA! Your vacation photos are now more colorful and jazzy than ever!

2. the volume button or bluetooth can now be used to take photos
- You can benefit a lot from a selfie stick on your vacation

3. Now we added a brightness setting
- Here comes more detailed and specific photo editing

4. Editing performance improved
- You can enter the editing a lot quicker
- Better performance of applying adjustments on preview.

5. iCloud loading progress is seen
- Apple's server status affects the loading speed
- added a loading progress bar

6. Bug with timer fixed
- Bug fixed where the timer didn’t work properly even after it was set

There are more Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
If you run into any issues or have a suggestion for a new feature on our app, DM us at @pica.app.

1. Now you don’t have to rotate your phots taken in landscape!
"Your photos taken in landscape stay the same as It was being taken in camera roll"

2. Bug fixed where information of the original photos (meta data) was not saved in edited photos.
- Information of camera and when and where the photo was taken are automatically saved in your edited photo so that you can keep your memories alive forever.

3. Bug fixed that music cuts out the second your camera is turned on.
- You can now take as many photos as you want on PICA while listening to music
- another bug fixed that the volume status pops up as you close the app

There are more Minor bug fixes
"If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app."

1. A new filter (SCENE #16)
- Try this beautiful new filter to make city night views even prettier

2. You can edit multiple photos at once
- Maximum 9 photos can be edited at once when you want to give them the same vibe

3. Your camera can be fired up quicker than ever
- Turn on the option, Launch Camera in setttings
- Now your camera can be turned on the second you open PICA

4. The advanced zoom allows you to capture subjects farther from you
- 5x zoom is now available ; It can be found once you touch the screen while shooting

There are more Minor bug fixes
"If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app."

1. A new filter (SCENE #16)
- Try this beautiful new filter to make city night views even prettier
2. You can edit multiple photos at once
- Maximum 9 photos can be edited at once when you want to give them the same vibe

3. Your camera can be fired up quicker than ever
- Turn on the option, Launch Camera in setttings
- Now your camera can be turned on the second you open PICA

4. The advanced zoom allows you to capture subjects farther from you
- 5x zoom is now available ; It can be found once you touch the screen while shooting

There are more Minor bug fixes
"If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app."

We've fixed an issue with the 'Launch Camera' option turned on!
If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app.

+
[v1.7 Update]

1. A new filter (SCENE #16)
- Try this beautiful new filter to make city night views even prettier

2. You can edit multiple photos at once
- Maximum 9 photos can be edited at once when you want to give them the same vibe
- You can make some afterwards adjustment such as Brightness or Exposure Compensation etc., on an each photo

3. Your camera can be fired up quicker than ever
- Turn on the option, Launch Camera in setttings
- Now your camera can be turned on the second you open PICA

4. The advanced zoom allows you to capture subjects farther from you
- 5x zoom is now available ; It can be found once you touch the screen while shooting

Fixed an issue that the app occurs crash when not connected to the internet!
If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app.
+
[v1.7 Update]

1. A new filter (SCENE #16)
- Try this beautiful new filter to make city night views even prettier

2. You can edit multiple photos at once
- Maximum 9 photos can be edited at once when you want to give them the same vibe
- You can make some afterwards adjustment such as Brightness or Exposure Compensation etc., on an each photo

3. Your camera can be fired up quicker than ever
- Turn on the option, Launch Camera in setttings
- Now your camera can be turned on the second you open PICA

4. The advanced zoom allows you to capture subjects farther from you
- 5x zoom is now available ; It can be found once you touch the screen while shooting

1. Added a new preset
- WD filter series that is best for portraits have just been added.
- PICA will be of a lot of help for your DIY wedding!

2. Added Crop and Rotation feature
- PICA is now with a more powerful editing feature.
- Eliminate unwanted part of the photo and save only what you really want

3.Fixed crash bug
-A bug fixed that the app crashes while shooting or editing photos on some types of phones.


There are more Minor bug fixes.
"If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app."

#. A new filter (SCENE #18)
- Give your photos analog camera feel with the Vintage Filter.

There are more Minor bug fixes
"If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app."

1. A new filter (SCENE #19)
- This amazing autumn filter will let you capture autumn leaves even more beautifully

2. Improved the performance of the app
- Increased the performance of the app as you open it.

There are more Minor bug fixes
"If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app."

1. A new filter (SCENE #20)
- Make your photo the pic of the day

2. Added Horizontal option to 'ADJUST'
- Go to Edit and click ADJUST and choose new feature, Horizontal to flip your photo

3. Added 'Mirroring'
- Turn off Mirroring and photos you just took won't be mirrored automatically
- Photos still would be mirrored in preview even when Mirroring is set off; It's not a bug

4. Layout improved and minor bug fixed
- Fixed the layout glitchy on phones that allow Larger Accessibility Sizes

There are more Minor bug fixes
"If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app."

A new filter (SCENE #21)
- Freeze a snowy day in a better and even clearer vibe with the new filter Snowflake!
+
There are more Minor bug fixes
"If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app."

A new filter (SCENE #22)
Capture unforgettable nightscape of the city with Tokyo Filter
+
There are more Minor bug fixes
"If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app."

1. We changed to a new look!
- The whole new design of the app gives you even better usual experience
- App name changed to '@picn2k camera'

2. Improved loading performance
- Now you can load pictures from your album even faster to edit them

3. Improved auto-focus performance
- Touch the subject you want to focus on
- Both AF and MF are available

There are more Minor bug fixes
"If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app."

1. A new film added (#25)
- Capture the warm spring with Pastel film

2. The latest setting values are saved and loaded
- A bug fixed where the latest screen aspect ratio used weren't saved and loaded

There are more Minor bug fixes
"If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app."
Fixed an issue where the contents of # 25 could not be seen in some languages.

1. A new film added (#26)
- Take some pictures with Rose film that will paint Europe beautifully

1. A new film added (#27)
- Capture the cool summer with blue Switzerland film

2. It doesn't create multiple albums anymore
- A bug fixed where the app creates multiple albums when shooting in some certain devices

3. It's now easier to name the file of your picture.
It's not a lot easier to manage the files of your photos whereas It used to be difficult with file names in TMP

1. A new film (#28)
- Capture a clear picture when the strong summer sunshine is against you

2. Albums improved
You edited a photo and press back to Albums. Now It bounced back to top. It was frustrating, wasn't it?
We've improved it. What you see when you press back to Albums is the picture you were looking at before you started editing.

There are more Minor bug fixes
"If you run into any issues or have any enquiries, DM us at @pica.app."

■ @Picn2k Camera Renewal
• Added a function to register [My Film] to edit photos with my settings
• Added filter list management function to edit filter favorites and order directly
• Improved the function of editing multiple photos to edit multiple photos at the same time
• Full size camera mode, wide angle/telephoto/ultra wide angle lens mode added
• UI design renewal

■ VIP Membership Subscription
• 2020 version new preset (New York, Austria, Seoul, New Zealand) released
• Wallpaper download
• Save my film list to the Cloud

# Fixed crashed in splash screen

■ @Picn2k Camera Renewal
• Added a function to register [My Film] to edit photos with my settings
• Added filter list management function to edit filter favorites and order directly
• Improved the function of editing multiple photos to edit multiple photos at the same time
• Full size camera mode, wide angle/telephoto/ultra wide angle lens mode added
• UI design renewal

■ VIP Membership Subscription
• 2020 version new preset (New York, Austria, Seoul, New Zealand) released
• Wallpaper download
• Save my film list to the Cloud
